name: Clone_an_integration__with_settings_and_credentials_
description:
Clone an integration, including all of its settings and credentials from one organization to another organization in the same group.
This API supports both brokered and non-brokered integrations.

Use this API for when you want to share a Broker token between several Snyk organizations (integrations).

orgId.description: Source organization public ID to clone integration settings from. The `API_KEY` must have access to this organization.

integrationId.description: Source integration public ID to clone.

destinationOrgPublicId.description: The organization public ID. The `API_KEY` must have access to this organization.
